pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interactive Maps Using 'Mapbox GL JS' and 'Deck.gl' // Provides a mechanism to plot an interactive map using 'Mapbox GL' (https://www.mapbox.com/mapbox-gl-js/api/), a javascript library for interactive maps, and 'Deck.gl' (http://deck.gl/#/), a javascript library which uses 'WebGL' for visualising large data sets.
